targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'used' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'free' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'buffered' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'cached' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "uptime_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "mysql_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'insert') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "uptime_value" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "uptime_value" WITH KEY = "host"
